## Introduction

The existing I-15 interchange at Main Street in Payson, Utah is under investigation for a potential redesign.
As such, the existing traffic conditions will be modeled to evaluate the performance of this interchange.
This document outlines the study area, data collection, analysis, and conclusions from this study.

## Study Area

The study area is the I-15 interchange at Main Street in Payson, Utah.
